author: Omar Rashid
title: Coronavirus | Despite U.P. CM’s appeal, migrant workers throng Lucknow’s bus stands
description: Without work or money, they see little point in staying put.
content:
Do din ho gaye khana nahi mila abhi (its two days since we have got proper food), said Neeraj Yadav as he trudged along a deserted street, hefting his meagre belongings.
With a small group of friends, Mr. Yadav is heading towards the Qaiserbagh bus station i… [+5086 chars]
